Html: Is there a way to save the cache on one machine (XP) and view it on a different machine (Win7) running the GMap demo?
Thanks for quick response.  How is this different from exporting a .gmdb file and importing it again in a different GMap instance?
raw copy is faster if the database is huge

Ok.  I know it's frustrating to have someone ask these types of questions, but please bare with me.  When I import the .gmdb file into the demo on a computer with no internet connection, the memory cache size is still 0.00MB of 22.00MB.  Am I missing something?  How can I view the data?
import is done into hdd cache, memory cache is purged when you close the app
